item.title: Vim First Steps
item.description: Jump to the cheat sheet! First step, option A: Vim in VS Code Contrary to the popular belief, learn vim by installing this VIM extension in VS Code. First step, option B Install an neovim, or a preconfigured setup like LunarVim (this is the one I’m currently using). There’s a whole playlist from ThePrimeagen. Don’t use it to code just yet Use vim to take notes. Create a Markdown file to write down your daily to-do’s.
